content: अपभ्रंशः {@--1@} Falling down or away, a fall; अत्यारूढिर्भवति महतामप्यपभ्रंशनिष्ठा <ls>Ś. 4</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> ending in a (precipitate) fall. {@--2@} A corrupted word, corruption; घर is an अपभ्रंश or corruption of गृह; (hence) an incorrect word whether formed against the rules of grammar or used in a sense not strictly Sanskrit; see अपशब्द. {@--3@} A corrupt language, one of the lowest forms of the Prākṛta dialect used by cow-herds &c. (in kāvyas); (in Śāstras) any language other than Sanskrit; आभीरादिगिरः काव्येष्वपभ्रंश इति स्मृताः . शास्त्रेषु संस्कृतादन्यदपभ्रंशतयोदितम् .. <ls>Kāv. 1.</ls>
